revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 38.;Pnepheros, son of Pnepheros ;;(in left margin: drachmas 16, obols 25) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 3, obols 4.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 3, chalki 2, naubion obols 2, chalki 2, surcharges obols 5.5, chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 2, obols 3, surcharges obol 1, chalki 2, in total drachmas 8, obols 3;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 9, obols 2, chalki 2, surcharges obols 3.5, chalki 2, drachmas 10;;Somas ;;Dios, son of Teberis through the agency of Stiynchis (wife of Africanus);;(in left margin: drachmas 32) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 6, obols 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 5.5, naubion obols 4, surcharges drachma 1, obols 3.5, chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 4, obol 1.5, surcharge obols 2, chalki 2, kollybos obol 1.5, in total drachmas 14, obols 2.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 15, obols 5, surcharge drachma 1, in total drachmas 16, obols 5;;Heraklas, son of Petheus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Eserempis, drachmas 8;;Kastor, son of Apion (son of Apitas, son of Kothon);;(in left margin, a little below the line: drachmas 8, obols 18) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 2, obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2, chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5, chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1, obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 5, obols 4, chalki 2;;Sarapion, son of Harpalos, grandson of Sarapion, mother Tapetheus, obols 28;;Sarapion, son of Phasis, grandson of Keras, mother Helene, drachmas 4;;Herieus the older, son of Horos, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Maronis, daughter of Ptolemaios (of Tainkimis);;(in left margin, a little above the line: drachmas 140... ) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 27, obols 3, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 3, obols 5, chalki 2, naubion drachmas 2, obols 4.5, surcharges drachmas 6, obols 5;;eparourion drachmas 18, obols 2, surcharge drachma 1, obols 3, chalki 2, kollybos drachma 1, obol 1, in total drachmas 62;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 68, obols 4.5, surcharges drachmas 4, obols 2, in total drachmas 73, obols 0.5;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachmas 3, obols 5, chalki 2, surcharge obols 2.5, kollybos obols 0.5, in total drachmas 4, obols 2, chalki 2;;. . . , obols 0.5;;Didymos, son of Heron, grandson of Heras, mother Tasiaipis, drachmas 4;;Sabinos, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Zoidous, drachmas 4;;Kastor, son of Kastor through the agency of Herais (of Taakoutia);;naubion of the katoikoi for the 13th year, drachma 1, surcharges obol 0.5, chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1, obol 1;;Onnophris, son of Onnophris, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 404, obols 22;;(Phamenoth) 30 likewise:;Herieus, son of Sambas, grandson of Peteesis, mother Tapapeis, drachmas 4;;Demas, son of Phanomgeus (of Kastresis, plaiter of wreaths);;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachma 1, tax on the produce of olives obol 1, naubion obol 0.5, chalki 2, surcharges obols 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 4, obols 14) eparourion obols 4, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachmas 2, obols 2.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 2, obols 3, surcharges obol 1, in total drachmas 2, obols 4;;Artemas, son of Heron, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Psenesis, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 16;;Ptolemaios, son of Sambas, grandson of Sabeinos, mother Aphrodous, drachmas 4."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
